title: Task 40

question.text: What does hit the snooze button mean in the context of an alarm clock?

answers.answer: To turn off the alarm clock permanently
answers.feedback: Hitting the snooze button delays the alarm temporarily, not turning it off permanently.

answers.answer: To press the button on the alarm clock for more sleep time
To set the alarm clock for the first time
answers.feedback: The phrase specifically refers to delaying the alarm, not setting it initially.

answers.answer: To increase the volume of the alarm
answers.feedback: Hitting the snooze button delays the alarm, rather than increasing its volume.

description:
The expression hit the snooze button refers to the action of delaying the alarm clock to sleep a little longer.

The verb hit in this context means to press, and snooze button is a feature on alarm clocks that allows for a brief delay in the alarm.
